mapper.select: SELECT date_format(MU.reg_date,"%Y-%m-%d") as reg_date ,MU.food_type ,MU.food_id ,FD.food_name ,SUM(MU.order_count) as order_count FROM tb_menu MU, tb_food FD WHERE MU.food_id = FD.food_id AND MU.food_type = FD.food_type and IFNULL(MU.can_yn,'N') = 'N' group by MU.reg_date ,MU.food_type ,MU.food_id ,FD.food_name order by MU.food_type ,MU.food_id ,SUM(MU.order_count) LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from ( SELECT MU.reg_date ,MU.food_type ,MU.food_id ,FD.food_name ,SUM(MU.order_count) as order_count FROM tb_menu MU, tb_food FD WHERE MU.food_id = FD.food_id AND MU.food_type = FD.food_type and IFNULL(MU.can_yn,'N') = 'N' group by MU.reg_date ,MU.food_type ,MU.food_id ,FD.food_name order by MU.food_type ,MU.food_id ,SUM(MU.order_count)) sale
